    \index{biblio \textit{(package)}!biblio.webquery \textit{(package)}!biblio.webquery.scripts \textit{(package)}!biblio.webquery.scripts.renamebyisbn \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module biblio.webquery.scripts.renamebyisbn}

    \label{biblio:webquery:scripts:renamebyisbn}

Rename files as by the ISBN buried in their original name.

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
